title: Ranked Flowchart
body: Hmm. I wonder what I should be doing. Let me consult this useful flowchart.

replies.body: Voting without bumping is a crime.
If that were the case, I'd probably be eligible for the death penalty.

> [{quoted}](name=Ginnjii,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=du2YogKJ,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-07T08:59:56.226+0000)
>
> If that were the case, I'd probably be eligible for the death penalty.

i am against the death penalty.
Lets make that a life sentence in Bronze V (300 elo level) for you! 

Actually, wouldnt that be more fun then permabanning people? Just demote their account to said elo without a chance to level up!

Demote a toxic Diamond 1 to Bronze 5

Easy wins for him and he gets enjoyment of stomping noobs.

*punishment*
I'll opt for the death penalty please.

> [{quoted}](name=Luke OrbwaIker,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=du2YogKJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-07T08:56:44.848+0000)
>
> Voting without bumping is a crime.

Actually, on the new forums it's rather the other way around. Voting has a bigger impact on visibility than bumping. Although, your first comment on a post also has a significant impact.
ur flowchart is missing the "take a nap" phase.
You mean before or after you finish the game?

IMO I tend to do worse right after a won game, I have higher expectations of myself and others, I suck early game because I was used to my late game power (I play a lot of "weak early, wrecking ball late")

But hey, if it works for you, it works.

The answer is always "yes".

No exceptions.
Sooo, just always play ranked games?
Not if you never started. Stupid unranked players should stay where they belong.

I voted only if it's twisted tree line, but I think it's a joke.

I ACTUALLY ENJOY 3v3, FUCK ME RIGHT? {{champion:2}}

> [{quoted}](name=YOU BEEN WARNED,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=du2YogKJ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-01-07T17:00:41.221+0000)
>
> I voted only if it's twisted tree line, but I think it's a joke.
> 
> I ACTUALLY ENJOY 3v3, FUCK ME RIGHT? {{champion:2}}

The problem is how broken Twisted Treeline is, and how many bots there are playing >.

It's not broken, it has it's own meta just like how 5v5 does. Certain broken freelo champs like Rek'Sai and Jarvan are broken on both maps doe.

Idk about the bot situation, but bots must be at low MMR because bots get defeated. Win a few games and you should get past.

Remember. HALT Stands for

Hungry? Play ranked!
Aggitated? Play ranked!
Lethargic? Play ranked!
Tired? Play ranked till you fall asleep!

(Common phrase told to pro gamers/pokerplayers etc)
You are missing the break in the loop which is when you get restrictions or bans from being so salty
